attributes.action: We call on the Prime Minister Tony Blair/Gordon Brown, to honour their 2005 manifesto commitment, to give the British people a referendum on the new EU Treaty/Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that ever since the original constitution was rejected by the French and Dutch, that it would return with a dressed up version which could then be presented to the people as just a tyding up exercise. The British people are fed up with this government taking us for granted, we demand to have what we were promised in 2005, that is a referendum on this new constitution (or treaty) and let us the British people have a say in our own futures. We do not want any more Spin or Lies but just what we were promised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
